name: Vorath
backStory: Born from the abyssal energies that permeate the Shattered Realms of Valthoria, Vorath is a being of pure malevolence. Once a mere shadow in the realm of darkness, he consumed ancient arcane knowledge and grew in power. Driven by an insatiable hunger for control, Vorath seeks to plunge the world into eternal night, where he can reign supreme. His twisted ambition is fueled by a desire to extinguish the light and bring about an age of despair. With the rise of Arvoth the Purifier and The Sacred Sentinels, Vorath faces his greatest challenge yet, but his resolve is unyielding.
